name: Space Cave
description:
Space Cave is a game for #LOWREZJAM

Controlls:

  • X to SHOOT BULLETS
  • Z to SHOOT ROCKETS/FIREBALLS
  • UP to FLY UP

In this game you fly through a cave filled with dudes that for some unknown reason want to kill you.

Sadly, this game is not finished :(
Because of *reasons* I can't continue on developing it till I can call it "finished".
So... for some time this game will stay unfinished, but as soon as I will be able to finish it, I will.

So yeah, have fun playing it :D
Feedback and criticism are greatly appreciated!
